TopicTitle: Is the early snowball earth style moon in the trailer tidally heated or just with the fortune of its parent planet being in its stars habitable zone?

Articles.Content: You saw the lengthy title, so....yeah what do you guys think, personally I think it is tidally heated but judging how close the parent star seems I am not so sure.
I believe we’re looking at Merbel, moon of a ringed gas giant Glumo in the Debdeb system. Depending how massive Glumo is it’s certainly possible tidal heating has melted portions of it.
